CustomField.formula: IF((CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "Tech Touch 1 Market 1") || CONTAINS ($UserRole.Name, "Account Management") && CONTAINS ($UserRole.Name, "Market 1")), "https://help.etrusted.com/hc/de?utm_source=email&utm_medium=CSM+AM&utm_campaign=SIGNATUR_HC&utm_content=Signatur", IF($UserRole.Name = "CX Manager Market 1" || CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "High Touch 1 Market 1") || CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "Mid Touch 1 Market 1"),"https://support.trustedshops.com/de/reputation-manager", CASE( Contact.language__c , "de", "https://support.trustedshops.com/de/produkttest", "es","", "en", "", "it", "", "nl", "", "fr","", "")))
CustomField.label: Signature Image URL
